Name: K9 UPRISING
About the game: Bring your best reactions, poise and dexterity. Because you'll need it to battle the waves of Alien Invaders in this high octane, adrenaline pumping fight for survival. Story Two scientists create there final experimental team to save the planet from an Alien invasion. Will they succeed? Features - Hundreds of enemy patterns. Also very scarce randomized sections to keep you thinking. - Hand crafted enemy placement with casual to challenging difficulty. Some dogs will have an easier time than others because there weapons handle so differently. - Select any mission from the beginning, so people of all experience levels can enjoy a fantastic shooting experience. - 100 stages. Every mission has 10 stages to complete a mission. - New competitive scoring system (between the dogs). Each bullet type has a different score depending on the enemy they touch. Discover each dogs style of play to maximize your score. - Another New scoring system. If your dog has multi shot basic weapons, then some guns can score higher points if you shoot them up close to you. The trade off here is your putting yourself at risk of getting hit. - Difficulty is tied to the dogs themselves. Some dogs will find different levels more challenging than others. - Weapon guides and how to play sections. - You have Infinite lives so just keep on playing until your hearts content. At the cost of having Infinite lives you lose a 100.000 score if you get hit 3 times. - K9's Uprising can appeal to casual or advanced players. Play for survival or score challenge all in the same mode. - 10 built in personal leader boards, one for each mission. Which dog will you dominate the boards with? - 5 different dog soldiers to select. Each has 3 unique weapons to master. - 15 Weapons and there base weapons upgrade automatically on later missions. So that makes 25 weapons in total. - Engaging story shows heavy script dialog from start to finish. You can speed up text or skip all the text entirely. 3 Ways Of Playing - Touch screen controls. - Hold Left mouse to get target then drag mouse to aim, Right mouse to fire, wheel up is special 1, wheel down is special 2. - Hold Left mouse to get target then drag mouse to aim, left arrow key to fire, up arrow for special 1, down arrow for special 2. There are no joypad controls yet.
